key_risks: Economic sensitivity due to reliance on Hawaii’s tourism-driven economy
Climate change and environmental risks, including hurricanes and rising sea levels
Regulatory and compliance challenges, including AML and data privacy requirements
Competition from fintech and national banks
Interest rate and asset quality risks
controversies: Recent SEC fine related to a 'pay-to-play' scheme
Customer complaints related to account closures
environmental_issues: Exposure to climate-related risks such as hurricanes and rising sea levels
social_issues: Customer complaints impacting reputation and trust
governance_issues: Regulatory scrutiny and fines, including AML and data privacy violations
